packages.name: Tropical Oasis
packages.description: Immerse your event in a lush, tropical paradise with this vibrant package. Featuring a mix of large palms, ferns, and colorful bromeliads, the Tropical Oasis brings a warm and exotic feel to any venue.

packages.name: Modern Minimalist
packages.description: Sleek and stylish, the Modern Minimalist package offers a collection of elegant succulents and cacti in contemporary containers. Perfect for adding a touch of green without overwhelming your space, this package is ideal for modern, chic events.

packages.name: Rustic Retreat
packages.description: Create a cozy, rustic atmosphere with the Rustic Retreat package. This collection includes hearty, earth-toned plants like philodendrons, snake plants, and potted herbs, perfect for outdoor or nature-inspired events.

packages.name: Zen Garden
packages.description: Promote peace and tranquility at your event with the Zen Garden package. Featuring a selection of bonsai trees, bamboo, and serene moss gardens, this package is designed to create a calm, meditative environment.

packages.name: Boho Bliss
packages.description: Add a touch of bohemian flair with the Boho Bliss package. This eclectic mix includes macram√©-hung plants, trailing ivies, and vibrant florals, perfect for free-spirited and artistic gatherings.

packages.name: Elegant Evergreen
packages.description: For a timeless and classic look, the Elegant Evergreen package offers a variety of lush, green plants such as ficus trees, peace lilies, and ferns. This package adds a sophisticated touch to any event.

packages.name: Desert Dreams
packages.description: Bring the beauty of the desert to your event with the Desert Dreams package. This collection includes various cacti, aloe vera, and desert roses, providing a unique and striking aesthetic.

packages.name: Coastal Charm
packages.description: Evoke the breezy, relaxed vibe of the seaside with the Coastal Charm package. Featuring a mix of grasses, beachy succulents, and palms, this package is perfect for beach-themed events or summer parties.

packages.name: Enchanted Forest
packages.description: Step into a magical world with the Enchanted Forest package. This whimsical collection includes ferns, moss-covered stones, and miniature trees, creating a fairy-tale setting for your event.

packages.name: Urban Jungle
packages.description: Transform your event into a thriving urban jungle with this dynamic package. Including a variety of large, leafy plants like monstera, fiddle-leaf figs, and rubber plants, the Urban Jungle is perfect for bringing a vibrant, energetic feel to any city event.

Private Mezcal tasting at Los Pollos Hermanos.
A first year wedding anniversary for Nashville's hottest couple.
Woo Girl Convention at Kid Rock's Big Ass Honky Tonk.
